reasoning: Paracoccidioidomycosis (PCM) endemic fungal infection in South America (Brazil, Colombia, Peru). Pulmonary PCM is the most common presentation (~90% of clinical cases). Annual incidence in endemic regions: 0.5-3 per 100k; global average ~2 per 100k weighted toward endemic countries. Limited to tropical/subtropical regions. Uses incidence as primary metric.
source: Brummer E et al. (1993). Paracoccidioidomycosis. Clin Microbiol Rev. 6(2):100-116
